Description: Out For Season (Shoulder) - Kessler will undergo left shoulder surgery to address a torn labrum and will miss the remainder of the 2025-26 season, as per Tony Jones of The Athletic.
Out (Shoulder) - The Jazz listed Kessler as Out on Thursday's (Dec. 18) game against the Lakers.
Day To Day (Groin) - The Jazz listed Markkanen as Questionable on Thursday's (Dec. 18) game against the Lakers.
Out (Foot) - The Jazz announced Monday (Dec. 15) that Niang will be re-evaluated in two weeks.
